plot: Lola, an over-weighted and eccentric woman, prepares herself for a very special night, helped by her cuban friend Aurora. But little she knows that her life is going to change very soon...
title: Los Reflejos de Lola
plot_es: Lola, an over-weighted and eccentric woman, prepares herself for a very special night, helped by her cuban friend Aurora. But little she knows that her life is going to change very soon...
plot_en: Lola, an over-weighted and eccentric woman, prepares herself for a very special night, helped by her cuban friend Aurora. But little she knows that her life is going to change very soon...
